name: PythonConfluenceAPI
summary: PythonConfluenceAPI is a Pythonic API wrapper over the Confluence REST API, which cleanly wraps all of the methods present in the current Confluence API spec, and is easily adapter to be used with minimal effort in other frameworks such as concurrent futures, greenlets, and other concurrency schemes.
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Lesser General Public License v2 or later (LGPLv2+)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
